title: Alpha Card Services Appoints New Director of Payroll Solutions
text:
Alpha Card Services 
PHILADELPHIA -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Alpha Card Services announced today that Kevin Costello has joined the organization to further develop their growing portfolio of customers for their payroll solutions division. With more than thirty years of industry experience, Kevin brings with him the expertise to ensure that Alpha continues to offer clients the leading-edge technologies that allow them to move their business forward. Joining the team at the onset of a period of unprecedented growth, Kevin can capitalize on his experience to help Alpha continue to move into the future. 
With aggressive goals set for the remainder of 2015, Kevin has reorganized Alpha’s payroll solutions to maximize both efficiency, as well as revenue. According to Kevin, “What interested me most about joining the team at Alpha is the complete suite of payroll solutions we offer to merchants. Like most providers, we offer business owners freedom from the responsibility of back-office duties; however, we actually do it. We enable owners to focus on running their business and increasing their profit.” 
Lazaros Kalemis, Founder and CEO, said, “The decision to bring Kevin on board was an easy one. As soon as we heard his vision and roadmap to refine this already great solution into something that adds even more value to our customers, we knew he was the right man to take Alpha’s Payroll Solutions to the next level. His passion for the business and his diverse history of success make him a perfect fit for the team. We never looked back.” 
About Alpha Card Services 
Headquartered in Pennsylvania, Alpha Card Services provides comprehensive, industry leading solutions for businesses of all sizes throughout the United States. Alpha’s business solutions include Merchant Services, POS, Payroll Services, Gift & Reward Cards, Cash Advances, ATM Services and more. Processing over $2 billion in transaction volume annually, our dedicated team works closely with each merchant to help maximize income potential and meet our merchants’ payment needs - all at competitive prices.
